change.changenote: Section 3 and 3 (a) BEFORE amended by 2007-14-212,Sch and 2007-14-213,Sch, effective December 1, 2007 (BC Reg 354/2007).

section.sectiontext: To carry out duties under this Act and the regulations, an inspector may do one or more of the following:

paragraph.paragraphtext: enter premises at any reasonable time for an inspection under this Act or regulations;
inspect the premises, a plant, root medium or container;
detain or order the detention of a plant, root medium or container;
carry out or direct the carrying out of treatment;
on the order of the minister, confiscate or destroy a plant, root medium or container;
carry out other duties and exercise other powers prescribed in the regulations.

change.changenote: Section 6 BEFORE amended by 2007-14-213,Sch, effective December 1, 2007 (BC Reg 354/2007).

section.sectiontext: A person adversely affected by an act or decision of an inspector under this Act or regulations may appeal to the minister in the prescribed manner.
